title: Serge Mouille Style Tripod Lamp
body: Minimalist yet brimming with creativity, the Serge Mouille Style Table Lamp, by Mobelaris, is a shining example of the sophisticated, thoughtful light fixtures of the 20th century. A high end style that expresses the originality and elegance of the original design, our version is made with Lacquered tapered iron and hand-polished in black or white finish with white-painted interiors and brass details. This light fixture is crouched like a mantis balancing its large aluminum shade, giving at an energetic, intelligent profile. A fabulous statement piece that will brighten your space for years to come.
